key.imblocker.checkIntervalMilli: Per how many ms do we check text field once?
key.imblocker.screenBlacklist: Matched screen would disable your IME
key.imblocker.screenWhitelist: Matched screen would enable your IME
key.imblocker.inputBlacklist: Matched input box would disable your IME
key.imblocker.inputWhitelist: Matched input box would enable your IME
key.imblocker.enableScreenRecovering: Do we output recoveredScreens? because it may cause lag
key.imblocker.recoveredScreens: Here lists all Screens that is not in whitelist nor blacklist, so you may easily add those to whitelist/blacklist.
key.imblocker.useExperimental: simulate inputting non-printable characters occasionally to detect active input box. Disable this and let me know if input or control is messed up.
key.imblocker.chatCommandInputType: The method of setting english state when detect command syntax in chat field.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.checkIn: Per how many ticks do we check text field once? Make sure checkDelay is an exact multiple of this.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.screenB: Matched screen would disable your IME
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.screenW: Matched screen would enable your IME
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.inputBl: Matched input box would disable your IME
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.inputWh: Matched input box would enable your IME
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.enableS: Do we output recoveredScreens? because it may cause lag
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.recover: Here lists all Screens that is not in whitelist nor blacklist, so you may easily add those to whitelist/blacklist.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.useExpe: simulate inputting non-printable characters occasionally to detect active input box. Disable this and let me know if input or control is messed up.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.chatCom: The method of setting english state when detect command syntax in chat field.

If your input method can't auto-switch to English state when using command syntax in chat field, set this option to DISABLE_IM may help, but note that you can only type English when typing command in this mode.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.title: IMBlocker Config
